010package imagingbook;
011
012import java.util.jar.Attributes;
013import java.util.jar.Manifest;
014
015import imagingbook.lib.util.FileUtils;
016
017/**
018 * This class provides version information for this library.
019 * See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3697449/retrieve-version-from-maven-pom-xml-in-code
020 * for alternatives.
021 * 
022 * 
023 * @author WB
024 *
025 */
026public abstract class Info {
027        
028        /**
029         * Reads version information from the MANIFEST.MF file of the JAR file from
030         * which this class was loaded. 
031         * 
032         * @return A string with the version information. 
033         * "UNKNOWN" is returned if the library was not loaded from a JAR file or if 
034         * the version information could not be determined.
035         */
036        public static String getVersionInfo() {
037                Manifest mf = FileUtils.getJarManifest(Info.class);
038                if (mf == null) {
039                        return "UNKNOWN";
040                }
041                //IJ.log("listing attributes");
042                Attributes attr = mf.getMainAttributes();
043                String version = null;
044                String buildTime = null;
045                try {
046                        version = attr.getValue("Implementation-Version");
047                        buildTime = attr.getValue("Build-Time");
048                } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) { }
049                return version + " (" + buildTime + ")";
050        }
051
052}
